name: NurseryRhymeTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open nursery rhyme trivia”
”Alexa, start nursery rhyme trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: nursery rhyme trivia
des:
Remember "Old MacDonald had a farm..." or "...the cow jumped over the moon". All of those bedtime stories are about to pay off. That's if you can avoid being tricked by Alexa. This fun game of trivia will have you humming nursery rhymes in no time, trying to figure out the answers to Alexa's questions. Like...

Who ran away with the dish after watching the cow jump over the moon?
...Its fleece was white as snow
Wonder...High...Diamond????

Seems easy, right? Well, good luck because Alexa has some creative ways of asking a question. 

This game is great at any age. So, play with your family and have fun.

Don't forget to rate and leave a comment.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
